name: Korie Peek
text: Such a neat preservation area!;The Sand Hill Cranes are gorgeous and their awe striking numbers are enough to make any uncallused driver want to pull off the road and soak in the viewing experiance. This year I had my first Whooping Crane sightings. I saw 3, 1 one time and 2 on another occasion.  They are so very white in comparison to the Sandhill, and they dwarf the poor Sandhill by a foot or better. A true sight to behold and will raise your HR with little to no effort!

name: Derek South
text: This place is a great place to bring the family. The wildlife that can be seen here in the fall and winter months is very impressive. The facilities are very nice and the trail and boardwalk were very well maintained.

name: Chris Newberry
text: Had a great day at the wildlifes annual watching the cranes come back.

name: Matthew “Matt S”
text: I would fish around this place and it's pretty good area

name: Julian Frederick
text: Great place .

name: Cathy Kirschner (Tater)
text: Spectacular

name: Shane King
text: The folks are great people and truly love the wildlife they take care of. They have assisted me with 3 various rescues now and each time I have dealt with them, they are knowledgeable, kind, and excited to help the little critters. If anyone has any questions about the local wildlife, these folks are great to talk to. Thank You!

name: Glamazon Amber
text: I have tried for over an hour to find help. These people were the ONLY ones to help me! The guy I spoke too was so sweet and knew a lot about the animal I needed help with.

name: Risha Bowman
text: They genuinely care for wildlife. They are so nice. I am forever thankful to them for taking, in two baby blue jays, to rehabilitate and release in the wild.

name: Michael Burkett
text:
I will never take an injured animal to this organization again! Do not give them any wildlife or money!
I took an injured hawk which didn't receive proper veterinary care and when I questioned why they refused to give out any more information to me about this hawk. They refused my offer to pay all medical costs for the hawk and refused Auburn's offer to take the hawk. How is that giving wildlife a second chsnce?? :(

name: Carrie Ann Mattimore
text: When my son found a baby squirrel that had fallen out of its nest and 2 days earlier I found a very large dead squirrel under the same tree, I put 2 and 2 together and figured that that was its mother. So I phoned a veterinary clinic and they gave me Big Bend wildlife Sanctuary 's phone number. The owners John and Carrie are very nice and helpful. They told me what liquids I could give to the baby squirrel and directions to their location. I checked on the baby squirrel a week later and he is healthy and doing great at their facility! They do accept  contributions but it is not mandatory for them to take in an animal and nurse it back to health. A+

name: Stacey Powell
text: What a special place for injured animals operated & maintained by some amazing people.  I found a injured Blue Jay Bird and the gladly accepted the little beauty.

name: Stacie Diaz
text: I am so in love with this place. They have such big hearts.

name: TimCaddell NonameTaxi
text: They saved the nicest opossum I ever seen from pneumonia.

name: Will Who
text: This place does great work.

name: G Williams
text: They're doing wonderful work here!

name: wolvesdefender
text: selflessness of the people that run and work here

name: pamela “pamelascot” lul
text: They love animals.

name: jettt111
text: We had a mid March trip planned but the tornadoes came so we put it off until this week. Thanks Vicki and see once again. We had the best time as usual   My wife and I fished for 2 days , we fished in the boat for the first half of day one , but my wife was having a hard time throwing with 11 rods sticking up in the rod holders so we bank fished the rest of the trip. I fished in every lake , grace , walking lake ? Luke , Caleb , tiger bass lake and Peyton and caught big fish in every one. The first day I beat my previous biggest bass caught at the ranch by 1 ounce a 5-11 but today I out did that with a 7 pound 0 oz bass. We had plenty of 4,s. 3,s.  And tons of others not pictured. My wife caught 2 monster bream and I caught 2  five pound catfish too. Thanks again everyone at the ranch. Another trip to remember for a lifetime

name: Steve Pettry
text: We have been coming here for 8 or more years. Great fishing and Vicky is the perfect host. A fisherman's dream.

name: Jimmy Unangst
text: Awesome experience. The owner goes above and beyond to make your experience a great one. We will go back as often as possible!!!!

name: Shaun Wood
text: Big bass can be found here! Great folks run this place.

name: David Hester
text: All around good fishing

name: Marty Dunn
text: Good
